intent: Return markdown content for a registered skill URI when resources/read is unavailable.

uri.description: Canonical skill URI in skill:// scheme.

validation: uri MUST map to a known registered skill identity

content.description: Plain text fallback including URI and markdown text.

success.parityRule: For engage skill URI, markdown text MUST equal resources/read text for the same URI.

content.description: Actionable remediation text for invalid or unsupported URI.

constraints: No stack traces or internal sensitive details

regressionGuards: jira and sosreport tool/resource surfaces unchanged
